About.name: Ajay Kumar Yadav
About.bio: I'm a passionate software developer with a strong interest in web development, full-stack applications, and creating impactful solutions in education and fitness technology. Currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering, I'm eager to leverage my skills in React, Node.js, and Django to build innovative projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering

Work Experience.title: Software Development Engineering Intern
Work Experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in web technologies including Frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap 5), Backend (Python, Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL), and Tools (Postman, Git & GitHub, Visual Studio Code). Developed features such as Comprehensive IPO Display, Search and Filter, Admin Panel, REST API, User Authentication, and other static and dynamic responsive features.

projects.title: Duolingo MVP Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a full-stack dashboard to track and visualize key performance metrics for a Duolingo Minimum Viable Product (MVP), including user activity, lesson completion, streaks, and downloads. The project involved product teardown, feature prioritization using RICE and KANO models, defining the MVP feature set, developing a GTM strategy, and setting success metrics.
features: Live metrics dashboard with real-time updates

project_details.product_teardown: Documented all current features of Duolingo, including learning features (e.g., lessons, spaced repetition), gamification (e.g., streaks, XP), social features (e.g., clubs), and subscription offerings (e.g., Super Duolingo, Duolingo Max).
project_details.feature_prioritization: Prioritized features for the MVP using RICE (Reach, Impact, Confidence, Effort) and KANO (Must-be, Performance, Attractive) models, selecting User Accounts, Basic Lessons for 2-3 languages, Course Structure, Progress Tracking, Gamification (Streaks, XP), and Simplified Spaced Repetition, considering a bootstrapped budget.
project_details.gtm_strategy: Developed a go-to-market strategy focused on viral growth through referral programs and social sharing, and community building via in-app forums and user-generated content, targeting young adults aged 18-35 interested in language learning.
project_details.success_metrics: Defined key metrics including downloads (50,000 in 3 months), daily active users (5,000 by month-end), retention (40% day 1, 20% day 7), average lessons completed (20 per user in first month), and app store rating (4.0 or higher).

projects.title: PCM_ChapterWise_Question
projects.description: Developed a web application for managing and practicing chapter-wise questions in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (PCM). The platform enables users to access categorized question banks and track their progress across individual chapters with a user-friendly interface built using modern web technologies.
features: Categorized question banks for Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics

projects.title: Modern-Fitness-Exercises-App
projects.description: Built a full-stack website providing exercises categorized by muscle group, equipment, and difficulty. Features a sleek interface for users to explore workouts, create custom fitness plans, and track progress, leveraging the MERN stack for robust functionality.
features: Search exercises by muscle group (arms, legs, chest, etc.)
View detailed exercise instructions and benefits

certifications.title: Full Stack Development with PHP & MySQL
